availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Snider. Father of Cinderella Snider and Martha J. Snider. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 22A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 72.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 304B.
Find A Grave, "Price Snider (7 Mar 1788-27 Apr 1873)," Memorial #26676593, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26676593 (accessed August 25, 2020).
